column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Marc - Thanks for your review. Can you tell me specifically why you felt your service was "ok at best"? This type of constructive feedback is indispensable to us. I am always interested to know how we can improve our station
column2: and fix potentially bad habits from continuing to form. I appreciate any time and energy you can assign to this request. Feel free to send me a private message or reply publicly.
